column4: hi, i have a .cue and and .wav file any clues how to play them ?
.cue files usually come in pairs with .bin files. Those are CD images.
so only a .cue and .wav files dont make sense ?? nothing can be done to them ?
.wav is audio.. if you got the codec, it can be played.  .cue files is (usualy) the structure in a .bin file used to burn a CD.
